short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirects YouTube Shorts URLs to their corresponding full-length video URLs for a seamless viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of waiting for the video to loop just to re-watch a 5 second section of a short? This lightweight extension automatically redirects any YouTube Shorts URLs to their corresponding full-length video URLs, ensuring a frictionless viewing experience.
